name: Barman
0:
”Alexa ask bar man how do you make a Blue Margarita”
”make a Blue Margarita”
”a Blue Margarita”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bar man
des:
Do you want to learn to make your own drinks, but don’t feel like flipping through a book of recipes? Want to be able to better entertain your friends in your at-home bar? With the Barman skill, learn how to make your favorites, or be more adventurous and try something new. Each drink is complete with the ingredients and instructions necessary to create them. There are hundreds of cocktails to try so be your own bartender today!

We are adding new features every week, so stay tuned for updates!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
